```{r}
library(tidyverse)
source("http://www.openintro.org/stat/data/cdc.R")
cdc <- as_tibble(cdc)
```
```{r}
head(cdc)
```
```{r}
cdc$exerany <- factor(cdc$exerany)
cdc$smoke100 <- factor(cdc$smoke100)
cdc$hlthplan <- factor(cdc$hlthplan)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data=cdc) + 
stat_count(mapping=aes(x=age, group=smoke100)) + 
  facet_wrap(~gender)
```
